page.title: 10Yeomans Farm, Kelly
page.content: Mixed farming with sheep and stock cattle. Cuts grass for hay and silage. Farmed by couple in early fifties, husband lived there for 40 years, likes bell ringing, church warden at Kelly. Wife lived at Yeomans for 30 years since marriage. C of E and WI member. Thinks Keely nice peaceful area to live in. Cannot see many changes in future. Very concerned about break down of law nationally and internationally. Shops in Launceston. Family 3 children, son 28 relief milker and sheep shearer. Plays rugger for Launceston RFC. Daughter 25 married, lives 15 miles away. Daughter 20 runs riding school at Yeomans, show jumps, member Tavistock YFC. Kingswell cottage derelict, abandoned after destruction by fire. Area unspoilt, some deciduous woodland with plenty of wildlife.
